item.title: Contact
item.description: Please send hat orders to angkorhats (at) gmail.com NB: For the sake of avoiding unnecessary spam I have not included a contact form- I hope you understand the above email is replacing what is in parenthesis with the @ symbol. Also, I prefer not to use paypal or any credit card transactions online for cost reasons and security! Deposit funds to bsb and account via your bank account for safest and secure transaction, the details of which will be forwarded to you once you email your order.
